Name: King of Knights, Alfred
Effect: [CONT](VC):Your units cannot boost this unit.[CONT](VC):During your turn, this unit gets [Power] +2000 for each of your <Royal Paladin> rear-guards.[ACT](VC/RC):[Counter-Blast 3] Search your deck for up to one grade 2 or less <Royal Paladin>, call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
Flavor: I command you under the name of the King of Knights! Warriors, heed my call!

Name: Blaster Blade
Effect: [AUTO]:[Counter-Blast 2] When this unit is placed on (VC), you may pay the cost. If you do, choose an opponent's rear-guard, and retire it.[AUTO]:[Counter-Blast 2] When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a <Royal Paladin>> vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, choose an opponent's grade 2 or greater rear-guard, and retire it.
Flavor: Courage is the sword of light. Shine forth, Blaster Blade!

Name: Barcgal
Effect: [AUTO]:When another <Royal Paladin> rides this unit, you may call this card to (RC).[ACT](RC):[Rest this unit] Search your deck for up to one card named "Future Knight, Llew" or "Flogal", call it to (RC), and shuffle your deck.
Flavor: When its bark echoes through the battlefield, heroes rally to support.

Name: Dragonic Overlord
Effect: [CONT](VC/RC):If you do not have another <Kagero> vanguard or rear-guard, this unit gets [Power] -2000.[ACT](VC/RC):[Counter-Blast 3] Until end of turn, this unit gets [Power] +5000, gets "Own(VC/RC):When this unit's attack hits an opponent's rear-guard, [Stand] this unit," and loses "Twin Drive!!".
Flavor: Burn, flame of despair! Eternal Flame!

Name: Embodiment of Victory, Aleph
Effect: [ACT](VC/RC):[Counter-Blast 4] This unit gets [Power] +3000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.[ACT](VC):[Choose a card named "Dragon Knight, Aleph", a card named "Embodiment of Armor, Bahr", and a card named "Embodiment of Spear, Tahr" from your soul, and put them into your drop zone] Turn all cards in your damage zone face up.
Flavor: Hear the roar of my soul! Take this, the Diablo Buster!!

Name: CEO Amaterasu
Effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if the number of cards in your hand is four or greater, this unit gets [Power] +4000.[AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, [Soul-Charge 1], look at the top card of your deck, and put that card on the top or the bottom of your deck.[AUTO](VC/RC):[Soul-Blast 8 & Counter-Blast 5] When this unit's attack hits, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw up to five cards.
Flavor: Shape my desire. Project it before me, Yata no Kagami!

Name: Battle Sister, Cocoa
Effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), if you have an <Oracle Think Tank> vanguard, look at the top card of your deck, and put that card on the top or the bottom of your deck.
Flavor: Well, well, do you like to feel pain?

Name: Asura Kaiser
Effect: [CONT](VC/RC):If you do not have another <Nova Grappler> vanguard or rear-guard, this unit gets [Power] -2000.[AUTO](VC):When this unit's drive check reveals a grade 3 <Nova Grappler>, choose one of your rear-guards, and [Stand] it.
Flavor: The death blow! Kaiser Buster!

Name: Demon Slaying Knight, Lohengrin
Effect: [AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC/RC):[Soul-Blast 8 & Counter-Blast 5] When this unit's attack hits, you may pay the cost. If you do, retire all of your opponent's rear-guards.
Flavor: Roar, demon slaying blade!

Name: Solitary Knight, Gancelot
Effect: [ACT](VC):[Counter-Blast 2] If you have a card named "Blaster Blade" in your soul, this unit gets [Power] +5000/[Critical] +1 until end of turn.[ACT](Hand):[Reveal this card to your opponent, and put it on top of your deck] Search your deck for up to one card named "Blaster Blade", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
Flavor: White wings of noble pride. A solitary knight is one who dances through the battlefield.

Name: Flash Shield, Iseult
Effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)[AUTO]:[Choose a <Royal Paladin> from your hand, and discard it] When this unit is placed on (GC), you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your <Royal Paladin> that is being attacked, and that unit cannot be hit until end of that battle.
Flavor: As long as there is the Flash Shield, knighthood will never waver.

Name: Future Knight, Llew
Effect: [ACT](RC):[Counter-Blast 1 & Choose a unit named "Future Knight, Llew", a unit named "Barcgal", and a unit named "Flogal" from your (RC), and put them into your soul] If you have a grade 1 vanguard, search your deck for up to one card named "Blaster Blade", ride it, and shuffle your deck.
Flavor: Boys will dream. Then the dream eventually becomes reality.

Name: Vortex Dragon
Effect: [AUTO](VC):At the begininng of your main phase, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.[ACT](VC/RC):[Soul-Blast 8 & Counter-Blast 5] Choose up to three of your opponent's rear-guards, and retire them.
Flavor: The hellfire that whirls through the battlefield, Burining Hell!

Name: Dragon Knight, Aleph
Effect: [ACT](VC):[Counter-Blast 1 & Choose a unit named "Embodiment of Armor, Bahr" and a unit named "Embodiment of Spear, Tahr" from your (RC), and put them into your soul] Search your deck for up to one card named "Embodiment of Victory, Aleph", ride it, and shuffle your deck.
Flavor: Let's go! Diablo Trans!

Name: Wyvern Guard, Barri
Effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)[AUTO]:[Choose a <Kagero> from your hand, and discard it] When this unit is placed on (GC), you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your <Kagero> that is being attacked, and that unit cannot be hit until end of that battle.
Flavor: The Wyvern Guard is the guardian of the Dragon Empire.

Name: Lizard Soldier, Conroe
Effect: [AUTO]:When another <Kagero> rides this unit, you may call this card to a (RC).[ACT](RC):[Counter-Blast 1 & Retire this unit] Search your deck for up to one grade 1 or less <Kagero>, reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
Flavor: True warriors are reborn as dragons.

Name: Maiden of Libra
Effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):[Counter-Blast 2] When this unit's attack hits, if you have an <Oracle Think Tank> vanguard, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card.
Flavor: Do not look away. This is the severity of your crime.

Name: Battle Sister, Mocha
Effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit attacks, if the number of cards in your hand is four or greater, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle.
Flavor: The kick of a prophet always hits.

Name: Battle Sister, Chocolat
Effect: [CONT]:Sentinel (You may only have up to four cards with "[CONT]:Sentinel" in a deck.)[AUTO]:[Choose a <Oracle Think Tank> from your hand, and discard it] When this unit is placed on (GC), you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your <Oracle Think Tank> that is being attacked, and that unit cannot be hit until end of that battle.
Flavor: No no no! Go away!

Name: Juggernaut Maximum
Effect: [CONT](VC/RC):If you do not have another <&ltSpike Brothers> vanguard or rear-guard, this unit gets [Power] -2000.[AUTO](RC):[Soul-Blast 1] When this unit attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle, and at the beginning of the close step of that battle, return this unit to your deck, and shuffle your deck.
Flavor: Smash to smithereens, Defensive Tackle!

Name: Knight of Silence, Gallatin
Flavor: My sword, you shall have.

Name: Dragon Knight, Nehalem
Flavor: It was truly one against many.

Name: Wyvern Strike, Tejas
Effect: [CONT](VC/RC):If this unit would attack, it may instead attack an opponent's unit in the back row of the same column as this unit.
Flavor: There is no escaping from a wyvern.

Name: Embodiment of Spear, Tahr
Flavor: Penetrate!

Name: Oracle Guardian, Apollon
Effect: [AUTO](VC):[Counter-Blast 2] When this unit's attack hits, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw two cards, choose a card from your hand, return it to your deck, and shuffle your deck.[AUTO](RC):[Counter-Blast 2] When this unit's attack hits, you may pay the cost. If you do, draw a card.
Flavor: Danger! Danger! Intruder alert! Proceeding to exclusion.

Name: Oracle Guardian, Wiseman
Flavor: There are no pests in the Oracle Think Tank.

Name: Lozenge Magus
Effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)[AUTO]:When another <Oracle Think Tank> rides this unit, you may call this card to (RC).[AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, the boosted unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle, and at the begininng of the end phase of that turn, return this unit to your deck, and shuffle your deck.
Flavor: Prophets can never be harmed.

Name: Mr. Invincible
Effect: [AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, [Soul-Chage 1], choose a card from your damage zone, and turn it face up.[AUTO](VC/RC):[Soul-Blast 8 & Counter-Blast 5] When this unit's attack hits, you may pay the cost. If you do, [Stand] all of your units.
Flavor: Evil will never prevail! Reward the good and punish the evil! The death blow, Hellstand!

Name: Brutal Jack
Effect: [CONT](VC/RC):Restraint (This unit cannnot attack.)[ACT](VC/RC):[Counter-Blast 1] Until end of turn, this unit loses "Restraint".[AUTO](VC):When this unit is boosted by a <Nova Grappler>, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.
Flavor: No rules! Brutal Blaster!

Name: King of Sword
Flavor: The King rules the Ring.

Name: Queen of Heart
Effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a unit named "King of Sword", the boosted unit gets [Power] +4000 until end of that battle.
Flavor: The Queen blesses triumph.

Name: Battleraizer
Effect: [AUTO]:When another <Nova Grappler> rides this unit, you may call this card to (RC).[AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts, the boosted unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle, and at the begininng of the end phase of that turn, return this unit to your deck, and shuffle your deck.
Flavor: My turn!

Name: Tyrant, Deathrex
Effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle.[AUTO](VC):When this unit's attack hits, choose one of your rear-guards, and retire it.
Flavor: Tear it apart, Tyranno-Fang!

Name: Assault Dragon, Blightops
Effect: [AUTO]:[Counter-Blast 1] When this unit is put into the drop zone from (RC), you may pay the cost. If you do, search your deck for up to one card named "Ironclad Dragon, Shieldon", reveal it to your opponent, put it into your hand, and shuffle your deck.
Flavor: Dinodragons run wild in packs.

Name: Stealth Dragon, Voidmaster
Effect: [AUTO](VC):When this unit attacks, if the number of cards in your hand is greater than your opponent's, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle.[AUTO](VC/RC):[Counter-Blast 1] When this unit's attack hits, if the number of cards in your hand is less than your opponent's, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, and discards it.
Flavor: Turn to stone! Ninjutsu, Evil-Eye Prison!

Name: Demon Eater
Effect: [AUTO](VC):At the beginning of your main phase, [Soul-Charge 1], and this unit gets [Power] +2000 until end of turn.[AUTO](VC/RC):[Soul-Blast 8 & Counter-Blast 5] When this unit's attack hits, you may pay the cost. If you do, retire all of your opponent's rear-guards.
Flavor: Her beautiful black hair even preys on demons.

Name: Monster Frank
Effect: [ACT][Drop zone]:[Counter-Blast 3] If you have a grade 2 vanguard, ride this card.
Flavor: Prepare to be sent to Davy Jone's Locker! Endless Whirlpool of Hell!

Name: Commodore Blueblood
Flavor: We're pirates. Don't take us lightly.

Name: Hell Spider
Effect: [CONT](VC):During your turn, if all of your opponent's vanguard and rear-guards are Rest , this unit gets [Power] +3000.[AUTO]:[Counter-Blast 2] When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and the chosen unit cannot [Stand] during your opponent's next stand phase.
Flavor: Rise from the underworld, avatar of evil! Hell Spider!

Name: Bloody Hercules
Flavor: The criminal society, Megacolony rise above all laws.

Name: Covenant Knight, Randolf
Effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit attacks, if the number of cards in your hand is greater than your opponent's, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle.
Flavor: Take that!

Name: Little Sage, Marron
Flavor: Leave it to me! I've got a plan!

Name: Lake Maiden, Lien
Effect: [ACT](VC/RC):[Rest this unit & Choose a card from your hand, and discard it] Draw a card.
Flavor: Was the weapon you lost, this bronze sword?Or this legendary holy sword?

Name: Wingal
Effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a card named "Blaster Blade", the boosted unit gets [Power] +4000 until end of that battle.
Flavor: I know. You are braver than anyone else!

Name: Weapons Dealer, Govannon
Flavor: Thanks for coming!

Name: Flogal
Flavor: How much longer are you sleeping? Wake up!

Name: Yggdrasil Maiden, Elaine
Effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)
Flavor: I will save you. I promise.

Name: Embodiment of Armor, Bahr
Flavor: The hero chosen to be the embodiment is said to gain the powers to defeat even gods.

Name: Dragon Monk, Gojo
Effect: [ACT](VC/RC):[Rest this unit & Choose a card from your hand, and discard it] Draw a card.
Flavor: Fallen warriors, may your souls rest in peace.

Name: Wyvern Strike, Jarran
Effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a card named "Wyvern Strike, Tejas", the boosted unit gets [Power] +4000 until end of that battle.
Flavor: Kageros rule the skies.

Name: Dragon Dancer, Monica
Flavor: Let's dance!

Name: Lizard Soldier, Ganlu
Flavor: Follow me!

Name: Dragon Monk, Genjo
Effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)
Flavor: Your sins shall be forgiven.

Name: Oracle Guardian, Gemini
Flavor: From love fortune-telling to business consulting, the Oracle Think Tank is an enormous corporation that rules all information.

Name: Weather Girl, Milk
Effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts an <Oracle Think Tank> vanguard, if the number of cards in your hand is four or greater, the boosted unit gets [Power] +4000 until end of that battle.
Flavor: When she forecasts sunshine, everyone carries an umbrella.

Name: Oracle Guardian, Nike
Flavor: The Goddess of Victory lends her hand to those who never give up.

Name: Dream Eater
Flavor: Time to feast!

Name: Miracle Kid
Flavor: Oh, sorry 'bout that!

Name: Hungry Dumpty
Effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a <Nova Grappler> vanguard, choose a card from your damage zone, and turn it face up.
Flavor: Can I eat you?

Name: Tough Boy
Flavor: The ultimate battle with no rules, that's the Nova Grapple!

Name: Screamin' and Dancin' Announcer, Shout
Effect: [ACT](VC/RC):[Rest this unit & Choose a card from your hand, and discard it] Draw a card.
Flavor: Ah! It's the legendary hero who descends onto the great universe also known as the ring! The invincible aura that transcends all history, time, and dimension is truly super ultra ultimate...

Name: Clay-doll Mechanic
Effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is placed on (RC), if you have a <Nova Grappler> vanguard, choose a card from your damage zone, and turn it face up.
Flavor: The ringside mage who assists the Grapplers.

Name: Shining Lady
Flavor: Go numb!

Name: Lucky Girl
Flavor: Wake up meow.

Name: Ring Girl, Clara
Effect: (You may only have up to four cards with "[Heal] HEAL" in a deck.)
Flavor: Next round, fight!

Name: Sonic Noa
Flavor: One of them is a threat. A pack of them spells hopeless.

Name: Ironclad Dragon, Shieldon
Flavor: Impenetrable and invincible.

Name: Stealth Beast, Chigasumi
Effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit attacks, if the number of cards in your hand is greater than your opponent's, this unit gets [Power] +3000 until end of that battle.
Flavor: Live in darkness, die in darkness. That is the fate of a ninja.

Name: Stealth Dragon, Dreadmaster
Effect: [AUTO](RC):[Counter-Blast 1] When an attack hits during the battle that this unit boosted a <Nubatama>, if the number of cards in your hand is less than your opponent's, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, and discards it.
Flavor: Ninjutsu, Bottomless Darkness..., now you can see nothing.

Name: Stealth Beast, Hagakure
Effect: [AUTO]:[Counter-Blast 1] When this unit is placed on (GC), if you have a <Nubatama> vanguard, and the number of cards in your hand is less than your opponent's, you may pay the cost. If you do, your opponent chooses a card from his or her hand, and discards it.
Flavor: Ninjas cannot be defeated without sacrifice. Suicide Burst!

Name: Blue Dust
Effect: [AUTO](VC/RC):When this unit's attack hits, if you have a <Dark Irregulars> vanguard, you may [Soul-Charge 1].
Flavor: One who approaches gets deprived of life, then turns to ice and shatters.

Name: Nightmare Baby
Effect: [AUTO](RC):When this unit boosts a unit named "Blue Dust", the boosted unit gets [Power] +4000 until end of that battle.
Flavor: A newly born evil, protected by a rainbow barrier.

Name: Rock the Wall
Effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put into the drop zone from (GC), put this card into your soul.
Flavor: An invincible body that repels all attacks.

Name: Highspeed, Brakki
Effect: [AUTO](RC):[Soul-Blast 1] When this unit attacks, you may pay the cost. If you do, this unit gets [Power] +5000 until end of that battle, and at the beginning of the close step of that battle, return this unit to your deck, and shuffle your deck.
Flavor: A lightning quick running back.

Name: Wonder Boy
Flavor: An electric shock runs through the field.

Name: Redshoe, Milly
Effect: [AUTO]:When this unit is put into the drop zone from (GC), put this card into your soul.
Flavor: A soaring wide receiver.

Name: Dandy Guy, Romario
Flavor: A water dripping dandy guy.

Name: Guiding Zombie
Effect: [AUTO]:When another <Granblue> rides this unit, you may call this card to (RC).[ACT](RC):[Put this unit into your soul] Put three cards from the top of your deck into your drop zone.
Flavor: Of course, it’s a quiet and peaceful place to sleep.

Name: Karma Queen
Effect: [AUTO]:[Counter-Blast 2] When this unit is placed on (VC) or (RC), you may pay the cost. If you do, choose one of your opponent's rear-guards, and the chosen unit cannot [Stand] during your opponent's next stand phase.
Flavor: Ahahaha! You shall cower before the power of the Queen!!

Name: Madame Mirage
Flavor: I will make you happy.
